title: LiteManager Pro 4.8
text:

Every day we offer FREE licensed software you’d have to buy otherwise. $10.00 Giveaway of the day — LiteManager Pro 4.8 Remote access software for the administration of computers over the Internet! User rating: 3 (38%) 5 (62%) 2 comments 
LiteManager Pro 4.8 is available as a Giveaway of the day! You have limited time to download and install it. Download Now LiteManager Pro 4.8 Terms and conditions 
LiteManager — remote access software for remote administration of computers over the Internet or remote control in a local network, for distant learning, providing remote support to users and supervising work activity of employees. 
The program allows to quickly and easily control computer desktop in real-time mode with full support for Windows, provides secure remote access to the file system, processes and services of the remote computer. LiteManager has built-in tools for creating network map, collecting technical data, ability to deploy and update using remote installation services, configure private ID router (NOIP) and many other features. Classroom management software.   XP/ Vista/ 7/ 8/ 10 Publisher:
